pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 11, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 11, 2016:

Washington, D.C., United States of America

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will lay a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier and at the Canadian Cross of Sacrifice.

Arlington National Cemetery

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will host a question and answer session with students.

American University

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon hosted by Canada 2020.

Mayflower Hotel

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the World Bank.

World Bank

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart Washington, D.C. for Ottawa.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
